de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.result

Interface HierarchicalResult

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Result
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Database, DoubleRelation, FullProjection, Projection, Projection1D, Projection2D, ProjectionParallel, Projector, Relation<O>, UpdatableDatabase
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDatabase, AbstractFullProjection, AbstractHierarchicalResult, AbstractProjection, AbstractSimpleProjection, AffineProjection, AprioriResult, BasicResult, Clustering, ClusterOrderResult, CollectionResult, ConvertToStringView, DBIDView, EvaluateClustering.ScoreResult, HashmapDatabase, HistogramProjector, HistogramResult, IndexStatistics.IndexMetaResult, JudgeOutlierScores.ScoreResult, KNNDistancesSampler.KNNDistanceOrderResult, MaterializedDoubleRelation, MaterializedRelation, OPTICSProjection, OPTICSProjector, OrderingFromDataStore, OutlierResult, ParallelPlotProjector, PointerHierarchyRepresentationResult, ProjectedView, ProxyDatabase, ProxyView, ReferencePointsResult, ScalesResult, ScatterPlotProjector, Segments, SettingsResult, Simple1D, Simple2D, SimpleParallel, StaticArrayDatabase

    public interface HierarchicalResult
extends Result
    Result with an internal hierarchy. Note: while this often seems a bit clumsy to use, the benefit of having this delegate is to keep the APIs simpler, and thus make ELKI development easier.
